Title: Flowers of Shanghai
Writer: Eileen Chang (translation), T'ien-wen Chu, Bangqing Han (novel)
Actors: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Michiko Hada, Michelle Reis, Carina Lau
Plot: In the "flower houses" (upscale brothels) of Shanghai, various interweaving stories of love, loyalty, and deceit play out subtly.
